title: 数据库相关错误
author: 皮皮懒不懒
txt_content: 插件链接数据库后出现[10:53:42 WARN]: Mon Mar 30 10:53:42 CST 2020 WARN: Establishing SSL connection without server's identity verification is not recommended. According to MySQL 5.5.45+, 5.6.26+ and 5.7.6+ requirements SSL connection must be established by default if explicit option isn't set. For compliance with existing applications not using SSL the verifyServerCertificate property is set to 'false'. You need either to explicitly disable SSL by setting useSSL=false, or set useSSL=true and provide truststore for server certificate verification.比如authme、marriage，authme可以关掉ssl但是marriage没有地方可以关，有什么办法可以修复吗？用的是phpstudy的集成环境

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
皮皮懒不懒 发表于 2020-3-30 11:00
用哪个版本
上面写了
 MySQL 5.5.45+, 5.6.26+ and 5.7.6+ requirements SSL

5.5.45 以下的版本， 5.6.26 以下的版本， 5.7.6 以下的版本

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 使用老版本的 mysql 就无需设置 usessl

replies.author: 皮皮懒不懒
replies.txt_content:
